gurmukhi: nIrd piRQm aucwr kY Dn pd bhur bKwn ] ipq kih Air kih bwn ky lIjhu nwm pCwn ]204]
transliteration: Neerad Pritham Ouchaar Kai Dhan Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Pit Kah(i) Ar(i) Kah(i) Baan Ke Leejoh Naam Pachhaad||204||
translation: Saying the word “Neerad” in the beginning, then uttering and adding the words “Dhvani, Pitaa and Ari”, the names of Baan are known.204.

gurmukhi: Gnj Sbd ko aucir kY Dn pd bhur bKwn ] skl nwm sRI bwn ky lIjo cqur pCwn ]205]
transliteration: Ghanaj Shabad Ko Oucdaar(i) Kai Dhan Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Sribaan Ke Lijo Chatur Pachhaad||205||
translation: Saying the word “Dhanaj” and then adding the world “Dhan”, all the names of Baan are recognized by the clever persons.205.

gurmukhi: m`q Sbd piRQmY aucir A`C Sbd pun dyh ] Ar pd bhur bKwnIAY nwm bwn lK lyhu ]206]
transliteration: Matt Shabad Prithmai Ouchar(i) Achchh Shabad Poun Deh|| Ar Pad Bahur Bakhaaneeai Naam Baan Lakh Leh(u)||206||
translation: Uttering the word “Maker” in the beginning, then saying and adding the words “Aksh and Ari”, all the names of Baan are known.206.

gurmukhi: piRQm mIn ko nwm lY cKu pd bhur bKwn ] skl nwm sRI bwn ky lIjhu cqur pCwn ]207]
transliteration: Pritham Meen Ko Naam Lai Chakh(u) Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Sribaan Ke Leejoh Chatur Pachhaad||207||
translation: Uttering the names of “Meen” (fish) in the beginning, then saying the word Chakshu, all the names of Baan are known207.

gurmukhi: mkr Sbd piRQmY aucir cKu pd bhur bKwn ] sBY nwm sRI bwn ky lIjo cqur pCwn ]208]
transliteration: Makar Shabad Prithmai Ouchar(i) Chakh(u) Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Sabhai Naam Sribaan Ke Leejo Chatur Pachhaad||208||
translation: Saying the word “Makar” primarily, then adding the word “Chakshu”, O wise people ! recognize all the names of Baan.208.

gurmukhi: JK pd piRQm bKwn kY cKu pd bhur bKwn ] sBY nwm sRI bwn ky lIjo cqur pCwn ]208]
transliteration: Jhakh Pad Pritham Bakhaan Kai Chakh(u) Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Sabhai Naam Sribaan Ke Leejai Chatur Pachhaad||209||
translation: Recognise all names of Baan, by uttering the word “Jhakh” in the beginning and then adding the word “Chakshu”.209.

gurmukhi: sPrI nyqR bKwn kY Air pd bhur aucwr ] skl nwm sRI bwn ky lIjo su kiv suDwr ]210]
transliteration: Saphrinetra Bakhaan Kai Ar(i) Pad Bahout Ouchaar|| Sakal Naam Sribaan Ke Leejo Su Kani Sudhaar||210||
translation: Saying the words “Safri (fish) and Netar” then uttering the word “Ari”, O poets ! Comprehend all the names of Baan correctly.210.

gurmukhi: mCrI c`Cu bKwn kY Air pd bhur aucwr ] nwm skl sRI bwn ky lIjo cqur suDwr ]211]
transliteration: Machharichachchh(u) Bakhaan Kai Ar(i) Pad Bahur Ouchaar|| Naam Sakal Sribaan Ke Leejo Chatur Sudhaar||211||
translation: Comprehend all the names of Baan correctly by uttering “Matsuachakshu” and the saying the word “Ari”.211.

gurmukhi: jlcr piRQm bKwn kY cKu pd bhur bKwn ] Air kih sB hI bwn ky lIjo nwm pCwn ]212]
transliteration: Jalchar Pritham Bakhaan Kai Chakh(u) Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Sabh Hibaan Ke Leejo Naam Pachhaad||212||
translation: Recognise all the names of Baan by saying “Jalchar” in the beginning, then adding and uttering the words “Chakshu and Ari”.212.

gurmukhi: bkqRwgj pd aucr kY mIn Sbd pun dyhu ] nwm islI muK ky sBY cIn cqur icq lyhu ]213]
transliteration: Baktraagad Pad Ouchar Kai Meen Shabad Pu Deh(u)|| Naam Silimoukh Ke Sabhai Cheen Chatur Chit Leh(u)||213||
translation: O wise people ! recognize all the names of Baan by uttering the word “Baktraagaj” and then adding the word Meen.213.

gurmukhi: piRQm nwm lY mIn ky kyq Sbd pun dyhu ] cKu kih Air kih bwn ky nwm cInR icq lyhu ]214]
transliteration: Pritham Naam Lai Meen Ke Ket Meen Shabad Poun Deh(u)|| Chakh(u) Kah(i) Ar(i) Kah(i) Baan Ke Naam Cheen Chit Leh(u)||214||
translation: Uttering the names of “Meen” in the beginning, then adding and saying the words “Ketu, Chakshu and Ari”, all the names of Baan are recognized in mind.214.

gurmukhi: sMbrwir pd piRQm kih cKu Duj pd pun dyhu ] Air kih sB hI bwn ky cInR cqur icq lyhu ]215]
transliteration: Sanbdaar(i) Pad Pritham Kah(i) Chakh(u) Dhuj Pad Poun Deh(u)|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Sabh Hibaan Ke Cheen Chatur Chit Leh(u)||215||
translation: O wise people ! Recognise the names of Baan by uttering the words “Sambrari” in the beginning and then saying and adding the words “Chakshu-dhvaj and Ari”.215.

gurmukhi: piRQm ipnwkI pd aucir Air Duj nyqR aucwr ] Air kih sB hI bwn ky lIjhu nwm suDwr ]216]
transliteration: Pritham Pinaakipad Ouchar(i) Ar(i) Dhuj Netra Ouchaar|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Sabh Hibaan Ke Leejoh Naam Sudhaar||216||
translation: Uttering the word “Pinaaki” primarily, then adding and saying the words “Ari”, Dhvaj, Netar and Ari”, all the names of Baan are spoken correctly.216.

gurmukhi: mhwNrudR Air Duj aucir puin pd nyqR bKwn ] Air kih sB sRI bwn ky nwm hiRdY pihcwn ]217]
transliteration: Mahaanrudra Ar(i) Dhuj Ouchar(i) Poun(i) Pad Netra Bakhaan|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Sabh Sribaan Ke Naam Hridai Paihchaan||217||
translation: Recognise all the names of Baan in your mind by saying the words Maha-Rudra and Aridhvaj” and then uttering the word “Netar”.217.
